If it is all the  time now, it will be all the time then. So, to claim the full right from BapDada  means to claim a right for the present and for the future full 21 births. So,  are you double foreigners those who will claim the full right, half or only a  little? What will you take? You want to claim your full rights? Full. Not even  one birth less.

So what will you have to do? BapDada makes every  child into one who has full rights. Have you become this? Are you sure? Or, is  there a question as to whether you will become this or not? Do you have this  question? Do you sometimes have this question: I dont know whether I will  become this or not? You have to become this. Are you sure? Those who want to  become this, raise your hands. You definitely have to become this. Achcha. Of  which rosary are all of you beads? Of the 108? How many

have come here? Are all  of you going to become part of the 108? However, you are 1800 here. So, will you  increase the rosary of 108? Achcha, but you wouldnt like to be of 16,000. Will  you become part of the 16,000? You will not, will you? You have this faith and  it is fixed - you should have this experience. Who else would become this if I  dont? Do you have this intoxication? If you dont become this, no one else will  become this, will they? You are the ones who are going to become this.

Say: We  are the ones. Pandavas, are you going to become this? Achcha. Those sitting at  the back, are you going to become this? Have you looked at yourselves in the  mirror? Have you? BapDada surrenders Himself on seeing the faith of each of you  children. Wah! Wah! Each child, wah! You are those who perform wonders, are you  not? Wah, wah! It is not Why? Why? is it? Does it sometimes become Why? No?  It is either why or hai, and the third is to cry. However, you are those who  are wah,

wah, are you not? BapDada has special  pride in the double foreigners. Why? The people of Bharat invited the Father  into Bharat. However, the Father has special pride in you double foreigners  because you have tied BapDada in the bond of love with your honesty. The  majority are honest. Some do hide things, but the majority of you do place your  weaknesses in front of the Father with honesty. The Father loves honesty more  than anything else. This is why, even on the path of devotion, they say:

God is  the Truth. Honesty is most loved and those who have honesty also remain clean.  They remain clean and clear. This is why the string of love for the honesty of  the double foreigners pulls BapDada. Sometimes, some are a little mixed.  However, you double foreigners must never let go of this speciality of yours:  honesty. The power of honesty works like a lift. Everyone loves honesty.  Pandavas, do you like it? Even those from Madhuban like honesty. All of you from  the different places of

Madhuban, raise your hands. Dadi says that all of you  are the arms. So, those from Madhuban, Shantivan, all of you, raise your hands.  Raise your hands high. Do those from Madhuban like honesty? Those who have  honesty will find it very easy to remember the Father. Why? The Father is also  the Truth. So, those who are honest will quickly be able to remember the true  Father. They dont have to make effort. If, even now, you find that you have to  labour to have remembrance, then you should

understand that honesty is lacking  somewhere or other in your subtle thoughts or in your dreams. Where there is  honesty, as soon as you have the thought, Baba, the Lord becomes present. This  is why BapDada loves honesty a lot. So, BapDada is  giving all of you children this signal: If you want to claim your full  inheritance for 21 births, then check your own kingdom now. Become a  self-sovereign now, and to the extent that you become this, accordingly, you  will receive a right. There is

the praise of the one kingdom. There will just be  one kingdom, not two. So, in your present stage of self-sovereignty, is there  constantly just the one kingdom? Is there self-sovereignty or is there sometimes  the kingdom (rule) of someone else too? If it is sometimes the kingdom of Maya,  then would you call it the kingdom of someone else or of your self-sovereignty?  So check that you constantly have the one kingdom and that you are not dependent  on others. Is it sometimes Mayas kingdom

and sometimes your own? From this, you  can understand that you are still claiming your full inheritance; it means you  havent received it but are still to receive it. So, check: do you constantly  have one kingdom? One religion: religion means dharna. So, what is the special  dharna? That of purity. So, is there the one religion, that is, purity in your  thoughts and dreams? If there is even a shadow of impurity in your thoughts or  dreams, what would you say? Is that one religion? Is there

complete purity? So,  check this. Why? Time is now moving fast. So, time is moving fast and if you are  going slowly, you will not be able to reach your destination in time. Therefore,  constantly check: is there the one kingdom? Is there one the religion? Is there  law and order? Or, does Maya give her orders? Gods children follow the law and  order of shrimat, not the law and order of Maya. Therefore, check: all the  sanskars of the future must be visible now, because it is now that you have

to  be filled with those sanskars. You will not fill yourselves with them there. You  have to fill yourselves with them here. Do you have happiness? Do you have  peace? Do you have prosperity? Your happiness now is not based on the  facilities, is it? Do you have supersensuous joy? The facilities are the support  for your physical organs. Supersensuous joy is not based on the facilities. Do  you have constant, unbroken peace? It never breaks, does it? What is the praise  of the kingdom of the

golden age? Unbroken peace. Unshakeable peace. Do you have  that fullness? What happens with wealth? You become complete and full. Do you  have the wealth of everything? The virtues, the powers and knowledge are your  wealth. What would be the sign of that? If you are full of all wealth, what is  the sign of that? Contentment. The basis of all attainment is contentment.  Discontentment is a sign of a lack of attainment. So check: let there not be  even one speciality missing. You are going to

create the whole world on the  basis of the sanskars of the present time. The sanskars of the present time will  create the future world. So, what do all of you say? Who are you? You are world  transformers, are you not? Are you those? Are you world transformers? So, before  becoming world transformers, you are self transformers. So, all of you need to  check these sanskars in yourselves. From this, you can understand whether you  are in the rosary of 108 or somewhere in the front or at the

back. This checking  is your mirror. See your present and future in this mirror. Can you see it? You have now come to  celebrate Holi. You have come to celebrate Holi. That is good. You have spoken  about the meaning of Holi, have you not? You have, have you not? So, today,  BapDada is especially speaking to you double foreigners, and those from Madhuban  are also with you. This is very good. BapDada is also speaking to those from  Madhuban as well as speaking to you. All those who have come,

whether you have  come from Bombay, Delhi or anywhere else, at this time, all of you are Madhuban  residents. Where are the double foreigners residents of at this time? You are  Madhuban residents, are you not? It is good to be a resident of Madhuban, is it  not? So, to all the children, whether you are sitting here in front of BapDada  or whether you are sitting at your own place or anywhere else, BapDada wants  there to be one transformation. If you have courage, BapDada will tell you about

it. Do you have courage? Do you have this courage? Do you have courage? You will  have to do it. You will have to do it, so dont raise your hands just like that  and think that it has happened - not like that. It is very good to raise your  hand, but raise the hand of your mind. Today, dont just raise that hand, but  raise the hand of your mind. You double  foreigners are sitting close, and so the things of the heart are told to those  who are close. It has been seen that the majority of you

have very good love for  BapDada and service. You cannot stay without the Fathers love and you also  cannot stay without doing service. This certificate of the majority of you is  good. BapDada sees everywhere, but There is a but. The sound that comes from  the majority is: There is one or another old sanskar, which, even against my  desire, still pulls me. So, you have now come to celebrate Holi, and Holi  means: to let the past be the past. It has happened, it is now over. So, if you

have any sanskar even slightly, 5%, 10% or even 50%, no matter how much it is,  if it is even five per cent, then burn the Holi of those sanskars. Those of you  who think that this sanskar disturbs you and everyone else from time to time:  you do understand what this is, do you not? Do you understand it? So, one Holi  is for burning and the other Holi is for colouring. There are two types of Holi.  The meaning of Holi is: past is past. So, now BapDada wants that whatever  sanskars you still

have, due to which transformation of the world is not taking  place - burn that weak sanskar today that is, cremate that weak sanskar. To burn  is also called having a cremation, is it not? When a person dies, they say that  there will be the cremation, that is, it has to be finished for all time. So,  today, can you have the cremation of even those sanskars? Can you do that? You  say: I dont want those sanskars to come, but they do come and so what can I  do? Do you think like this? Achcha.

It comes by mistake. If something you  have given away to someone comes back to you by mistake, what do you do? Will  you carefully put it in a cupboard? So, even if it does come back, dont keep it  in your hearts because the Father is sitting in your hearts, is He not? Would  you like it if you place those sanskars with the Father? You would not like it,  would you? So, if it comes back, even by mistake, then say from your heart,  Baba, Baba, Baba. Thats all! Finish it! A full stop will

be applied. What is  Baba? The Point. So, a full stop will be applied only if you say it from your  heart. If you simply remember Baba with your own selfishness and say, Baba,  take it away. Take it away, you keep it with you. Although yet you tell Baba to  take it away, how would He take it? So, what will you do? Will you celebrate  Holi? Will you celebrate it? Holi  Ho li (It has happened). Achcha. Those who  think that they will have this determined thought  OK, you will repeatedly try

to get rid of it, will you not? Then it will go away. Do not keep it inside you:  What can I do? How can I do this? I cant get rid of it. Dont say this. You  have to remove it. So, will you have this determined thought? Those who will do  this, raise your hands! Raise the hand of your mind, not just externally. Raise  the hand of your mind. (Some were not raising their hands.) These people are not  raising their hands. Very good. Congratulations. Congratulations. It is just  that, on one

side, the advance party is repeatedly asking BapDada: How much  longer? How much longer? How much longer? Secondly, the elements are also  telling the Father: Now bring about transformation. Even Father Brahma is  saying: When will the gates to the supreme abode open? You want to go with  him, do you not? You dont want to be left behind, do you? You will go with him,  will you not? You will open the gates with him. Even if Brahma Baba turns the  key, you will be with him, will you not?

So, now bring about this  transformation. That is all. You have to bring about this transformation. It is  not something that belongs to you. Why have you kept something that belongs to  someone else, something that belongs to Ravan? Should you keep something that  belongs to someone else? So, who does this belong to? It belongs to Ravan, does  it not? Why have you kept something that belongs to him? Should you keep it? You  will not keep it, will you? Are you sure? Sure? Achcha. You may

celebrate Holi  with colours, but first celebrate this Holi. You can see that your praise is:  Merciful. Are you? You are the merciful gods and goddesses, are you not? Are  you? So, do you not feel mercy? Your brothers and sisters are so unhappy; do you  not feel mercy seeing their sorrow? Do you feel mercy? So, change your sanskars  and the world will then change. Unless you change your sanskars, the world  cannot be changed. So what will you do? Today, BapDada heard  the good news that

everyone wants to take drishti. That is good. BapDada is  obedient to the children, but You are laughing on hearing, but. You may  laugh It is said: The world changes through ones vision. So, you have to  transform the world with the drishti you receive today. BapDada sees that to  become perfect and to receive all attainments, this practice over a long time is  needed. Dont think that it will happen at that time; no. You want to claim your  fortune of the kingdom for a long time, and so

perfection is also needed over a  long time. Is that OK? Are you double foreigners happy? Achcha. To all you special  souls who are seated on all three thrones, to the special souls who are  self-sovereigns, to the great donor souls who become merciful and give souls a  drop of happiness and peace, to the souls who are equal to the Father and who  constantly experience determination and success, BapDadas love, remembrance and  namaste. Blessing: May you be  introspective and put the expansion

of thoughts and words into their essence. Stop the expansion  of waste thoughts and become stable in the stage of the essence, that is, merge  the sound of wasteful words and make it powerful, that is, put it into its  essence. This is introspection. Such introspective children with their power of  silence can show wandering souls their correct destination. This power of  silence can show many beautiful, spiritual, colourful games. With the power of  silence, you can hear the sounds in the minds

of every soul so closely that it  is as though they are speaking personally in front of you. Slogan: To remain  light in your nature, sanskars, relationships and connections means to become an  angel. Avyakt Signal: Adopt  the culture of truth and good manners Honest children who have honest hearts,  are able to become a point within a second and remember the Father, the Point  because of the greatness of their honesty. Those with honest hearts please the  Lord, and because of receiving special

blessings from the Father, they are able  to keep their heads yuktiyukt (using the right methods) and carry out any task  accurately according to the time. This is because they have pleased the Father,  the Intellect of the Wise. Those who have pleased God are automatically raazyukt  (knowing all secrets) and yuktiyukt. Notice: Today is the third Sunday World  Meditation hour from 6.30pm to 7.30pm when all brothers and sisters collectively  sit for yoga tapasya and have these pure feelings for

all souls: Let all souls  benefit, let all souls walk on the path of truth and claim a right to their  inheritance. I am a soul who, like the Father, gives all souls the blessing of  liberation and liberation in life.

Brahma Kumaris Brahma Kumaris 17/01/25    Morning Murli                Om Shanti                BapDada    Madhuban Essence:  Sweet  children, you are the most valuable servants of Bharat.On the basis of shrimat  you use your bodies, minds and wealth to make it into the kingdom of Rama. Question:  What is the  true spiritual service that you children are now doing? Answer:  By following  shrimat, you children are establishing a pure land of happiness in an incognito  way. This is your true,

spiritual service of Bharat.By following the unlimited  Fathers shrimat, you are liberating everyone from Ravans jail.For this, you  are becoming pure and making others pure. Song:  Show the path  to the blind, o God! Om shanti.  There is such  a big difference between saying the words, O Prabhu, o God, o Supreme Soul,  and saying the word Father. There is so much regard in saying, O God, o  Prabhu, whereas the word Father is very ordinary. There are many fathers.  Even in prayers,

people say Prabhu, O God. Why do they not say Baba? After  all, He is the Supreme Father. It is as if the word Father becomes suppressed  and the words Supreme Soul become more important. People call out: O God,  show the path to the blind! Souls say: Baba, show us the path to liberation  and liberation in life. The word Prabhu is so great, whereas the word  Father is very ordinary. You understand that the Father comes and explains to  you. In the physical world, there are many

fathers. People even call out: You  are the Mother and Father. These words are very ordinary. By saying, God or Prabhu,  people think: What can He not do? You children know that the Father has now  come. The Father shows you a very elevated, easy path. The Father says: O My  children, by following Ravans dictates and by sitting on the pyre of lust, you  have been totally burnt. I have now come to purify you and take you back home.  This is why you call out to the Father to come and make

you pure from impure.  The Father says: I have come to serve you. All of you children are also on  spiritual service of Bharat. No one, except you, is able to do this service. It  is for Bharat that you do it. You become pure by following shrimat and you also  make Bharat pure. Bapu Gandhiji also wanted the kingdom of Rama to come. Now, no  human being is able to create the kingdom of Rama. Otherwise, why would they  call out to God as the Purifier? Now, you children have so much love for

Bharat.  You are the ones who do true service of Bharat in particular and the whole world  in general. You know that you are once again making Bharat into the kingdom of  Rama, which Gandhiji wanted. He was the father of a limited nation, whereas that  One is the Father of the unlimited. He does unlimited service. Only you children  know this. Some amongst you also have the intoxication, numberwise, that you are  creating the kingdom of Rama. You are Government servants. You are creating a

divine Government. You have intoxication for Bharat. You understand that it used  to be a pure land in the golden age and that it is now impure. You know that you  are now creating a pure land, a land of happiness, through the Father and that,  too, in an incognito way. You also receive shrimat in an incognito way. You are  doing this for the Government of Bharat. By following shrimat, you are doing the  most elevated service of Bharat with your bodies, minds, and wealth. Many from  the Congress

Party went to jail, but there is no need for you to go to jail.  Yours is a spiritual matter. Your war is against the five vices of Ravan, the  one who rules the kingdom of the entire earth. This is your army. That Lanka is  a small island, whereas this world is an unlimited island (Lanka). By following  the unlimited Fathers shrimat, you liberate everyone from Ravans jail. You  know that this impure world has to be destroyed anyway. You are Shiv Shaktis.  You gopes (brothers) are also Shiv

Shaktis. You are doing great service of  Bharat in an incognito way. As you make progress, everyone will come to know  about this. Your service, based on shrimat, is spiritual. You are incognito. The  Government does not know that you Brahma Kumaris are making Bharat into a most  elevated land of truth with your minds, bodies and wealth. Bharat used to be a  land of truth, but it is now a land of falsehood. Only the one Father is the  Truth. It is said, God is Truth. He is giving you true

teachings in order to  change each of you from an ordinary human into Narayan. The Father says: I made  you into Narayan from an ordinary human in the previous cycle too. They have  written such tall stories in the Ramayana. It says that Rama took an army of  monkeys. Previously, you were all like monkeys. It wasnt a question of just one  Sita. The Father explains how He destroys the kingdom of Ravan and establishes  the kingdom of Rama. There is no question of any difficulty in this. People

spend so much money on creating effigies of Ravan and then burning them. They do  not understand anything. Many eminent people go and watch that. Foreigners are  also invited to come and watch it, but they dont understand anything. The  Father now explains all of these things, and so you children have enthusiasm in  your hearts for doing true, spiritual service of Bharat. The rest of the world  is following Ravans dictates, whereas you are following Ramas shrimat. Whether  you say Rama or

Shiva, it is the same thing; God has been given many names. You  children are Bharats most valuable servants, who are following shrimat. People  call out: O Purifier, come and purify us. You know how much happiness you  receive in the golden age. You receive limitless treasures. Even the average  lifespan there is very long. There, they are yogis, whereas here, all are bhogis  (those who indulge in sensual pleasures). There, they are pure, whereas here,  they are impure; there is the difference

of day and night. Shri Krishna too is  called a yogi. They also call him a mahatma (great soul), but he is the true  mahatma. It is his praise of being full of all virtues that is sung. Both that  soul and his body are pure. Sannyasis are born to householders through vice and  then they become sannyasis. The Father now explains these aspects to you. At  this time, people are unrighteous and unhappy. What were they in the golden age?  They were religious and righteous. They were 100 % solvent and

ever happy. There  is the difference of day and night. Only you know this accurately. No one is  able to know how Bharat became hell from heaven. They worship Lakshmi and  Narayan and build temples to them, but they dont understand anything. The  Father continues to tell you that you can explain to those who have a good  position and you can also explain these things to Birla: how Lakshmi and Narayan  achieved their status and what they did that temples are built to them. To  worship someone

without knowing his occupation is like worshipping a stone idol;  that is the worship of dolls. Those of other religions know that Christ came at  such-and-such a time and they believe that he will come again. Therefore, you  children should have a great deal of inner spiritual intoxication. You spirits  should have this happiness. You have been body conscious for half a cycle. The  Father says: Now become bodiless. Consider yourselves to be souls. I, this  soul, am listening to the Father. In

other satsangs, they never think that the  spiritual Father is sitting there and explaining to spirits. It is the spirit  that listens to everything. The soul says: I am a Prime Minister, I am  so-and-so. That soul says through his body that he is the Prime Minister. You  now say that you souls are making effort to become the deities of heaven. I am a  soul and this is my body. It takes great effort to become soul conscious. If you  repeatedly consider yourselves to be souls and remember the

Father, all your  sins will be absolved. You are the most obedient servants. You perform this task  in an incognito way. Therefore, you should also have the incognito intoxication  that you are spiritual servants of this Government. You are making Bharat into  heaven. Bapuji also wanted there to be a new Bharat in the new world; he wanted  New Delhi. This is not a new world now. This old Delhi is going to become a  graveyard and it will then become a land of angels. You cannot call it a land of

angels now. You are creating New Delhi, a land of angels, for a new world. These  aspects have to be understood very clearly. You should not forget these things.  It is such an elevated task to make Bharat into a land of happiness again.  According to the drama plan, the world has to become old. It is now a land of  sorrow. Only the one Father is called the Remover of Sorrow and the Bestower of  Happiness. You know that the Father comes every 5000 years to make sorrowful  Bharat happy. He gives

happiness as well as peace. People also ask how they can  have peace of mind. Now, peace can only exist in the land of peace, the sweet  home. It is called the land of silence, where there is no sound or sorrow. Even  the sun and moon etc. dont exist there. You children now have all of this  knowledge. The Father has come as your Obedient Servant. However, no one knows  the Father at all. People call anyone a great soul, but there can be no great  soul now - only in heaven. Souls there are pure

and, because they are pure, they  also have peace and prosperity. They dont have purity now and so they have  nothing. There is regard for purity. Deities are pure, which is why people bow  down in front of the idols of them. Pure ones are pure and impure ones are  impure. That One is the unlimited Bapuji of everyone in the world. Even a mayor  can be called the father of a city. Such things do not exist there. The kingdom  there functions according to the law. People call out: O Purifier,

come! The  Father says: Now become pure! Then, they ask: How is this possible? How would  children be born? How would the world population grow? They dont realise that  Lakshmi and Narayan are completely viceless. You children have to tolerate so  much opposition. Whatever happened in the drama in the previous cycle will  repeat. It is not that you have to stand still because of the drama and think  that you will receive it if it is in the drama. Would you pass at school by  sitting idly in

that way? People have to continue to make effort for everything.  Without making effort, you cannot even obtain water. Whatever effort you make,  second by second, is for your reward. You have to make unlimited effort in order  to have unlimited happiness. It is now the night of Brahma, and so it is also  the night of Brahmins. Then, it will be the day of Brahmins. You used to study  this in the scriptures, but you did not understand anything. This Baba himself  used to relate the Ramayana, the

Bhagawad, etc.; he used to sit like a pundit.  You now understand that that is the path of devotion. Devotion is separate from  this knowledge. The Father says: You have all become ugly by sitting on the pyre  of lust. Shri Krishna is also called The ugly and the beautiful one.  Worshippers are those with blind faith. There is so much worship of evil. To  worship someones body means to worship the five elements. That is called  adulterated worship. Devotion was initially unadulterated; there

was worship of  Shiva alone. Just look at the things people worship now. The Father shows many  wonders and He also explains this knowledge to you. He is making you into  flowers from thorns. That is called a garden of flowers. There was a Pathan  watchman who lived in Karachi; he would go into trance. He would say: I went to  heaven and Khuda (God) gave me a flower. He experienced great pleasure. It was a  wonder. People talk of the seven wonders of the world. In fact, heaven is the  wonder of

the world. No one knows this. You have received such first-class  knowledge and so you should have so much happiness. BapDada is the highest and  yet He remains so simple. When they sing that He is incorporeal and egoless, it  is the Fathers praise that is sung. The Father has to come to serve you. A  father always serves his children, gives them wealth and property and then he  goes into the stage of retirement. He sits his children on his head. You  children become the masters of the world.

You will go to your sweet home and  then go down and claim your sweet kingdom. The Father says: I do not receive a  kingdom. Only the one Father is the true, altruistic Server. Therefore, you  children should have so much happiness, but Maya makes you forget. You should  not forget such a great BapDada. There is so much intoxication in having the  grandfathers property. You have found Shiv Baba. It is His property. The Father  says: Remember Me and imbibe divine virtues. You have to remove all

devilish  traits. They sing: I am without virtues; I have no virtues. There is also an  organisation called The institution of those without virtues. Now, no one  understands the meaning of that. To be without virtues means to have no virtues,  but they do not understand that. The Father says that you children only have to  explain one thing. Say: We are on the service of Bharat. We are following the  shrimat of the One who is the Bapuji of all. This is why the Shrimad Bhagawad  Gita is

remembered. Achcha. To you sweetest,  beloved, long-lost and now-found children, love, remembrance and good morning  from the Mother, the Father, BapDada. The spiritual Father says namaste to you  spiritual children. Essence for dharna: 1. Just as  the highest BapDada is simple, so you have to become very simple, incorporeal  and egoless in the same way. Churn this first-class knowledge that you receive  from the Father. 2. In order to  attain unlimited happiness in this drama which repeats

identically, make  unlimited effort. Do not stop making effort or leave everything to the drama.  You definitely have to make effort for your reward. Blessing:  May you make  the atmosphere powerful with your spiritual endeavour for having an angelic form  and thereby become an avyakt angel. The way to make the  atmosphere powerful is to make spiritual endeavour with your angelic form.  Repeatedly pay attention to this because, however you make spiritual endeavour,  you have to pay attention to

that. So, to make spiritual endeavour of the avyakt  form means that repeatedly you have to do the tapasya of paying attention.  Therefore, keep the blessing of becoming an avyakt angel in your awareness and  do the tapasya of making the atmosphere powerful. Whoever comes in front of you  will then go beyond anything physical and all wasteful matters. Slogan:  In order to  reveal the Almighty Authority Father, increase your power of concentration. With your powerful  mind, do the service of

giving sakaash. Just as you set a  timetable for your physical activities according to each daily programme, in the  same way, also set a programme to have a powerful stage of your mind. The busier  you keep your mind in having powerful thoughts, the less your mind will have  time to get upset. Constantly to have a set mind means to be concentrated, and  so your good vibrations will automatically spread everywhere and service will  take place.

Brahma Kumaris Brahma Kumaris 17 /02/25    Morning Murli                Om Shanti                BapDada    Madhuban Essence:  Sweet  children, the Father has come as your Guest, so you have to respect Him. You  have invited Him here with love. You also have to respect Him; you must not show  any disrespect. Question:  Which  intoxication should you children constantly have? What would be said, if your  intoxication doesnt rise? Answer:  The  highest-on-high Personality has come into this

impure world as our Guest. Let  this intoxication remain constantly high. However, your intoxication rises,  numberwise. Even after belonging to the Father, some have doubting intellects  and let go of His hand. It would then be said: That is their fortune. Om shanti.  Om shanti.  This has to be said twice. You children know that one is Baba and that the other  is Dada. The two are together. People sing the highest praise of God, but the  words God, the Father are very simple. You would not

just say Father; you  say God, the Father. His praise is very high. He is also definitely invited  into this impure world. He Himself comes and tells you: I am only invited into  the impure world. However, no one knows how He is the Purifier or when He comes.  No one knows whose kingdom it was for half a cycle in the golden and silver ages  and how it was established. The Purifier, the Father, definitely comes. Some  call Him the Purifier, some call Him the Liberator. They call out: Take us

to  heaven. He is the Highest of all. You invite Him to come into this impure world:  Come and make us residents of Bharat elevated. His position is so high. He is  the Highest Authority. You call Him because it is the kingdom of Ravan.  Otherwise, who could free you from this kingdom of Ravan? The intoxication of  you children should remain high when listening to these things. However, it does  not rise that much. Everyone else gets intoxicated by taking alcohol, but you  dont get intoxicated

by taking this. Here, it is a matter of dharna. It is also  a matter of fortune. The Father is a very great Personality. There are still  some among you who do have total faith. If you all had faith, why would some  have run away when they had doubts? They forgot the Father. Once you belong to  the Father, your intellect should not have any doubt about the Father. This  Father is wonderful. There is a saying: They recognise Baba and become amazed.  They say Baba. They listen to this knowledge

and relate it to others. Then,  oh! Maya, you fill their intellects with doubt. The Father explains that there  is no essence in the scriptures of the path of devotion. The Father says: No one  knows Me. Even among you children, only some of you stay in remembrance and that  is with difficulty. You also feel that your remembrance isnt stable. I, a soul,  am a point. Baba too is a point. He is our Father. He doesnt have a body of His  own. He says: I take the support of this body. My name is

Shiva. My name, the  name of this soul, never changes. The names of your bodies continue to change.  It is the bodies that are named. When a marriage takes place, the brides name  changes. Then that name is fixed. The Father says: Now make this firm: I am a  soul. It was the Father who gave this introduction: Whenever there is deviation  from righteousness and there is defamation, it is then that I come. You dont  need to hold on to any words. The Father Himself says: They put Me in the

pebbles and stones and defame Me so much! This is not a new thing. Cycle after  cycle, only after they become totally impure in this way and defame Me do I then  come. This is in My part, cycle after cycle. There cannot be any change in this;  it is fixed in the drama. Many ask you: If He only comes in Bharat, will only  Bharat really become heaven? Yes; this is the original, eternal part. The  Father is the Highest on High. The Father who purifies the impure says: They  only call Me into this

impure world. I am ever pure. I should be invited into  that pure world. However, there is no need for Me in a pure world. They only  call out to Me in this impure world: Come and purify us! I am such a great  Guest. You have continued to remember Me for half a cycle. Here, if you invite  an important person to come, that invitation would last, at the most, for one or  two years. If not this year, so-and-so will come next year. You have been  remembering that One for half a cycle. That Ones

coming is also fixed in His  part; it is predestined. No one knows this either. He is the highest-on-high  Father. On the one hand, human beings invite the Father with love and, on the  other hand, they tarnish His praise. In fact, that One is the highest Guest of  Honour, but they have tarnished His honour. They just say: He is in the pebbles  and stones, in everything. He is the Highest Authority. They invite Me to come  with so much love too, but they are completely senseless. I come and give

you My  introduction and tell you that I am your Father. I am called God, the Father.  Only when everyone is imprisoned by Ravan does the Father need to come, because  all the devotees are His brides, Sitas. The Father is the Bridegroom, Rama. It  is not a matter of one Sita. He liberates all the Sitas from Ravans jail. This  is an unlimited matter. This is an old, impure world. It is accurate for it to  become old and then new. Some bodies grow old quickly; others last for a longer  time. This

is fixed accurately in the drama. I have to come again after 5000  years. Only when I come can I give you My introduction and explain the secrets  of the cycle. Neither does anyone recognise Me, nor do they know Brahma, Vishnu,  Shankar, Lakshmi and Narayan or Rama and Sita. These are the most important  actors of all in the drama. This applies to human beings. There are no human  beings with eight or ten arms. Why is Vishnu portrayed with four arms? What are  the ten heads of Ravan? No one

knows this. Only the Father comes and speaks this  knowledge of the beginning, the middle and the end of the world. He says: I am  the greatest Guest of all, but I am also incognito. Only you know this. However,  although you know, you forget. You should have so much regard for Him; you  should remember Him. Souls are incorporeal; the Supreme Soul is also  incorporeal. There is no question of having a photo for this. You just have to  have the faith that each of you is a soul. Remember the

Father and let go of  your body consciousness. Only constantly see imperishable things. Why do you  look at perishable bodies? Become soul conscious! This requires effort. To the  extent that you stay in remembrance, accordingly you will reach your karmateet  stage and attain a high status. The Father teaches very easy yoga, remembrance.  There are many types of yoga. The term remembrance is accurate. Effort is  required in remembering the Supreme Soul, the Father. Very few speak the truth,

when they say that they stayed in remembrance for this long. When they dont  have remembrance at all, they are too ashamed to say so. They write: Throughout  the whole day, I stayed in remembrance for one hour. So, they should be ashamed.  Such a Father should be remembered night and day, and yet you only remember Him  for an hour. A great deal of incognito effort is required for this. You invite  the Father to come, so the One who comes from so far away would be the Guest.  The Father says: I

dont become the Guest in the new world. I only enter the old  world. I come and establish the new world. This world is old. No one knows this  accurately. They dont even know the lifespan of that new world. The Father  says: Only I come and give you this knowledge and then, according to the drama,  this knowledge disappears. Then, after a cycle, this part repeats again. They  call out to Me. Year after year, they celebrate the birthday of Shiva. The  anniversaries of those who have been and

gone are celebrated year after year.  Shiv Babas birthday is also celebrated every 12 months, but no one knows when  they started to celebrate it. They simply say: It has been hundreds of thousands  of years. They have written that the duration of the iron age is hundreds of  thousands of years. The Father says: This cycle is a matter of 5000 years. It is  certain that the kingdom of these deities existed in Bharat. Therefore, the  Father says: I am the greatest Guest of Bharat. You have been

continuing to give  Me many invitations for half a cycle. When you become very unhappy, you say O  Purifier, come! I have to come into this impure world. I too need a chariot.  This soul is an immortal image; this is his throne. The Father too is the  Immortal Image. He comes here and sits on this throne. These things are very  entertaining. If anyone else were to hear them, they would be amazed. The Father  says: Children, now follow My directions! Understand that it is Shiv Baba who is

giving these directions, that it is Shiv Baba who is speaking the murli. This  one says: I also play His murli and listen to it. It is that One who speaks it.  The number one, worthy-of-worship one, then becomes the number one worshipper.  He is now an effort-maker. You children should always consider yourselves to be  receiving Shiv Babas shrimat. Even if anything does go wrong, He puts it right.  When there is this unbroken faith, Shiv Baba is responsible. This is fixed in  the drama.

Obstacles are to come anyway. Very severe obstacles will come. Your  own children also obstruct you. Therefore, constantly understand that it is Shiv  Baba who is explaining. You will then have remembrance of Him. Many children  think that Brahma Baba is giving these directions. That is not so. Only Shiv  Baba is responsible. When they repeatedly become body conscious, they continue  to look at this one. Shiv Baba is such a great Guest! In spite of that, railway  employees etc., do not recognise

Him. How could they recognise or understand the  Incorporeal? He cannot become ill. So, whatever reason there is for illness  etc., it is to do with this one. What could they know about the One who is in  this one? You children, too, understand this, numberwise. That One is the Father  of all souls and this one is the Father of Humanity. So, these two have become  such great Guests. The Father says: Whatever happens, it is fixed in the drama.  I too am bound by this drama. Because it is

predestined, I can do nothing about  it. Maya is also very powerful. Both Rama and Ravan have parts. If Ravan were to  be someone living in the drama, he too would say: I, too, come according to the  drama. This is a play of happiness and sorrow. Happiness is in that new world,  sorrow is in this old world. In that new world, there are only a few people,  whereas in this old world, there are so many human beings. They only call out to  the Purifier Father to come and purify the world. It is

because there used to be  a lot of happiness in the pure world, that they call out to Him cycle after  cycle. The Father gives happiness to everyone and then departs. This part  repeats again now. The world never comes to an end. It is impossible for it to  end. The ocean is also in the world. This is the third floor. They say: It  becomes flooded, that there is water and only water everywhere. Nevertheless,  the earth is the floor. There is also water. The floor, the earth, can never be

destroyed. Water is also on this floor. However, on the second and first floors,  which are the subtle region and the incorporeal world, there is no water. This  unlimited world has three floors. No one except you children knows this. Tell  everyone this aspect of happiness with great joy. This memorial of supersensuous  joy is only remembered of those who pass fully. Those who are engaged in doing  service day and night and who continually do nothing but service experience  great happiness.

There are some days when human beings stay awake at night.  However, when the soul is tired, one has to sleep. When the soul goes to sleep,  the body also goes to sleep. If the soul doesnt sleep, the body too doesnt  sleep. It is the soul who gets tired. Who said Today, I am really tired? The  soul. You children have to remain soul conscious. Only in this do you have to  make effort. If you dont remember the Father and dont stay soul conscious,  your relations of the body, etc. begin to be

remembered. The Father says: You  came naked and you have to return naked. Forget those relations of bodies, etc.  Remember Me while you are living in those bodies and you will then become  satopradhan. The Father is such a great Authority. No one, except you children,  knows Him at all. The Father says: I am the Lord of the Poor; all are ordinary.  The Purifier, the Father, has come. If they were to know this, who knows how  crowded it would become? When important people come here, there is

such a crowd.  Therefore, according to the drama, that Ones part is to remain incognito. As  you make progress, your influence will gradually increase and destruction will  take place. It is not as though everyone can meet Baba. They do remember the  Father. Therefore, they will receive His introduction. The rest will not be able  to come here. For example, the daughters in bondage are not able to meet Baba;  they tolerate so many assaults. People cannot give up vice, so they ask how the  world

would carry on without it. Ah, but is the burden of the world on the  Father or on you? If they were to know the Father, they would not ask such  questions. Tell them: At least, first recognise the Father and you will then  come to know everything. You need clever ways with which to explain. Achcha. To you sweetest,  beloved long-lost and now-found children, love, remembrance and good morning  from the Mother, the Father, BapDada. The spiritual Father says namaste to you  spiritual children.

Essence for dharna: 1. Remain  constantly in remembrance of the Father, the Highest Authority. Do not look at  anyones perishable body but make effort to become soul conscious. Keep an  honest chart of your remembrance. 2. Remain engaged in  doing service day and night and thereby experience limitless happiness. Explain  with happiness the secrets of the three worlds to everyone. Have unbroken faith  in the shrimat that Shiv Baba gives and move forward. Do not be afraid when an  obstacle comes.

Shiv Baba is responsible. Therefore, have no doubt about  anything. Blessing:  May you  become multimillion times fortunate and experience a right to all attainments at  this elevated time. You fortunate  children who take birth at this elevated time experience belonging as soon as  you take birth with the touching of the previous cycle. You have a right to all  the property as soon as you take birth. Just as a whole tree is merged in a  seed, in the same way, you souls who come at the number

one time experience the  treasures of all forms of attainment as soon as you come. You would never say  that you experience happiness but not peace, or that you experience peace but  not power. You are filled with all experiences. Slogan:  In order for  you to give the experience of coolness in the shade of your happiness, become  clean and humble. Have love for  solitude and imbibe unity and concentration. Those who have all  relationships with the One and experience all types of sweetness from

that One  will have love for solitude. Since you can experience all sweetness from the  One, what need is there for you to go in many directions? Just remember the One  word, for all of this knowledge, awareness, relationships and your stage are  included in that. Together with that, all of your attainment become very clear  through just that one word. Have remembrance of One and a constant stage. The  knowledge that you receive is just for remembrance of the One, and the  attainment that you
receive is also constant.

Brahma Kumaris Brahma Kumaris 17 /03/25    Morning Murli                Om Shanti                BapDada    Madhuban Essence:  Sweet  children, study is to earn an income. This study is your source of income. Only  through this study can you accumulate an income for 21 births. Question:  What are the  visible signs of the children who experience the omens of Jupiter? Answer:  They pay full  attention to shrimat. They study very well. They never fail. Those who disobey  shrimat fail in their

studies. The omens of Rahuare over them. The omens of  Jupiter, the Lord of the Tree, are now over you children. Song:  Take us away  from this world of sin to a place of rest and comfort. Om shanti.  This is the  call of sinful souls. You no longer have to call out because you are becoming  pure. These matters have to be imbibed. Just as in a school, a study is a  treasure, so this study too is a very valuable treasure. You are able to earn  your livelihood from what you study. You children

know that God is teaching you.  This is a very high income because your aim and objective is in front of you.  The true satsang (company of the Truth) only takes place once in the whole  cycle. You called out: O Purifier come! They are still calling out, whereas He  is sitting in front of you. You children know that you are making effort for a  new world where there will be no name or trace of sorrow. You receive rest and  comfort in heaven. There is no rest or comfort in hell. This is an

ocean of  poison; it is the iron age. Everyone is unhappy; everyone is born through sin.  This is why souls call out, Baba, we have become impure. They bathe in the  Ganges in order to become pure. Achcha, once they have bathed, they should have  become pure. So, why do they bathe again and again? Whilst stumbling around,  they come down the ladder and become sinful souls. It is the Father who sits  here and explains to you children the significance of your 84 births. Those of  other religions

do not take 84 births. You have created a very good picture of  84 births (the ladder). There is a picture of the kalpa tree in the Gita too.  However, no one knows when God spoke the Gita or what He did when He came.  People of other religions know about their own scriptures, but the people of  Bharat know absolutely nothing. The Father says: It is only at the confluence  age that I come to establish heaven. There cannot be any change in the drama.  Whatever is fixed in the drama has to repeat

identically. It isnt that it  happens once and that it then changes. The cycle of the drama is instilled in  the intellects of you children very well. You can never be liberated from the  cycle of 84 births. That means that this world cycle can never end. The history  and geography of the world repeat. This picture of the cycle of 84 births is  most essential. The pictures of the Trimurti and the world cycle are the main  ones. Everything is shown clearly in the cycle. Each age has 1250 years.

This is  like a mirror for the blind. It is a mirror of the horoscope of 84 births. The  Father speaks about the omens of you children. The Father shows you unlimited  omens. You children are now under the imperishable omens of Jupiter. Everything  depends on how you study. Over some, there are the omens of Jupiter, whereas  over others, there are the omens of Venus and over others, there are the omens  of Rahu. If there is failure, there are the omens of Rahu. The same thing  happens here. When

you do not follow shrimat, there are the imperishable omens  of Rahu. Those are the imperishable omens of Jupiter and these are the omens of  Rahu. You children have to pay a lot of attention to how much you study. You  must not make excuses such as that your centre is too far away. Even if it takes  six hours to reach a centre by walking, you should go. When people go on a  pilgrimage, they stumble so much. Previously, many used to go on foot. Some  would even go on bullock carts. That is a

question of just going to one city.  This university of the Father is so great that you become like Lakshmi or  Narayan. Yet, for such an elevated study, some say that it is too far away, or  that they do not have time. What would the Father say? That such a child is not  worthy. The Father comes to uplift you and you then destroy your own truth.  Shrimat says: Become pure and imbibe divine virtues. Even though you live  together, you must not indulge in vice. There has to be the sword of this

knowledge and yoga between you. We have to become the masters of that pure  world. At present, we are the masters of this impure world. Those deities were  double crowned. Then, after half a cycle, they lost their crown of light. No one  at present has a crown of light. The founders of religions are shown with these  (haloes), because they are pure souls who incarnate into bodies. In Bharat there  are those who are double crowned and also those who are single crowned. Even  today, those with a

single crown still bow to the idols of those with a double  crown, because they were pure emperors and empresses. Emperors are greater than  kings and have greater property. At court, the emperors sit at the front and the  kings sit, numberwise, behind them. Their court is very systematic and  disciplined. This, is Gods court too. It is also remembered as the Court of  Indra. You become angels by studying this knowledge. A beautiful person is  called an angel. Radhe and Krishna have natural

beauty. This is why they are  called beautiful. When they sit on the pyre of lust, they become ugly in all  their many different names and forms. These things are not mentioned in the  scriptures. There are the three things: knowledge, worship and disinterest. This  knowledge is the highest of all. You are now receiving this knowledge. You have  disinterest in devotion. This whole tamopradhan world is now to be destroyed, so  you have disinterest in it. When a new building is being built, there

is  disinterest in the old one. That is a limited matter whereas this is an  unlimited matter. Your intellects are now connected to that new world. This is  an old world, hell. The golden and silver ages are called the land of Shiva  because they are established by Shiv Baba. You now dislike this brothel. Many  people do not dislike it. They want to fall into the gutter and destroy  themselves by getting married. All human beings are drowning in this river of  poison. They are in that dirt. They

continue to make one another unhappy. It is  said: Why should you renounce nectar and drink poison? They do not understand  the meaning of what they say. You children are also numberwise. A sensible  teacher would instantly be able to tell if someone's intellect is wandering  elsewhere. If someone yawns or nods off in the middle of class, it would be  understood that that ones intellect is wandering to his home or business.  Yawning is also a sign of tiredness. When people are earning an income

in their  business, they sit till one or two in the morning and never yawn. The Father  gives you such treasures. Therefore, to yawn is a sign of loss. Those who have  become bankrupt continue to nod off and yawn a lot. You continue to receive so  many treasures after treasures. Therefore, you have to pay a lot of attention.  If, at the time of studying, someone yawns, a sensible teacher can understand  that that ones intellect is wandering off in yoga elsewhere. While you are  sitting here,

you remember your home or children. You are sitting here in a  bhatthi; no one else should be remembered. It would be said of those who stay in  a bhatthi for six days and then remember someone and write a letter to that one  that they have failed. They have to start the seven days again. You are made to  sit in a bhatthi for seven days so that all your illness can be removed. You  have been greatly diseased for half a cycle. Even whilst sitting somewhere, some  have untimely death. This never

happens in the golden age. Here, there is always  some illness or other. Whilst dying, they cry out because of that illness. There  isn't the slightest sorrow in heaven. There, at the right time, they understand  that the time for that body is at an end. "I am to leave this body and become a  child". Here, you will have visions of what you are to become there. Many people  have visions like this. Through this knowledge you can understand that you are  changing from beggars to princes. Your aim

and objective is to become Radhe or  Krishna, not Lakshmi or Narayan. Radhe and Shri Krishna go through the complete  5000 years. Lakshmi and Narayan have at least 20 to 25 years less. This is why  there is greater praise of Shri Krishna. No one knows that Radhe and Krishna  become Lakshmi and Narayan. You children understand that this is a study. You  continue to open a centre in every village. This is your  university-cum-hospital. You only need three square feet of land for this. It is  a

wonder! If it is in someone's fortune, he will have a satsang even in his  room. There are many wealthy people here but their wealth will turn to dust. You  are now claiming your inheritance for your future 21 births from the Father. The  Father Himself says: Whilst seeing this old world, your intellects should be in  yoga there. Practise this whilst doing everything. You have to consider  everything. You are now practising this. The Father explains: Always carry out  pure acts; never perform an

impure act. If you have any illness, the Surgeon is  sitting here; take advice from Him. Each of you has your own illness. You  receive good advice from the Surgeon. You can ask what you should do in your  situation. Pay attention so that you dont carry out any sinful act. It is said:  As is the food, so the mind. Those who buy meat, those who sell meat or serve it  to others to eat accumulate a burden. Never hide anything from the Father, the  Purifier. If you hide something from the Surgeon,

that illness cannot be  removed. This is the unlimited, eternal Surgeon. People of the world do not know  Him. You are now receiving this knowledge but you still lack yoga a lot. You do  not stay in remembrance at all. Baba knows that you are unable to stabilise  yourselves in remembrance instantly; it is numberwise. When you have finished  the pilgrimage of remembrance, it will be said that you have reached your  karmateet stage. There will then be the war. Until then, something or other will

continue to happen. The war can begin at any time and everything will then come  to an end. However, the conscience says that the Great War cannot begin until  the new kingdom has been established. There will be small wars and they will  stop. No one knows that a kingdom is being established. There are people with  satopradhan, sato, rajo and tamo intellects. Amongst you, those with satopradhan  intellects continue to have remembrance very well. There must be hundreds of  thousands of Brahmins.

However, some of them are real children whereas others  are stepchildren. The real ones do good service. They follow the directions of  the Mother and Father, whereas the stepchildren follow the directions of Ravan.  They continue to limp along, sometimes following the directions of Ravan and  sometimes following the directions of Rama. You children heard in the song:  Baba, take us away to a place where there is rest and comfort. Only in heaven is  there rest and comfort; there isn't even the

name of sorrow. Heaven is called  the golden age. It is now the iron age, and so how could heaven be here now?  Your intellects are now becoming clean. Those with degraded intellects bow down  in front of those with clean intellects. Regard is given to those who remain  pure. Sannyasis remain pure. This is why householders bow their heads to them.  However, sannyasis take birth through vice and then become sannyasis, whereas  deities are completely viceless. Sannyasis wouldnt be called

completely  viceless. Therefore, children, your mercury of happiness should rise within you.  This is why it is said: If you want to know about supersensuous joy, ask the  gopes and gopis who are studying and receiving the inheritance from the Father.  Your intoxication rises here because you listen to Baba personally. For some,  the intoxication remains permanently high, whereas for others it quickly  disperses. Because they become influenced by bad company, their intoxication  doesnt remain

stable. Many such people go to the centres. They have a little  intoxication. Then they go to a party and drink and smoke and finish everything  for themselves. The influence of bad company is very negative. Swans and storks  cannot live together. In some cases, the husband becomes a swan and the wife  remains a stork, and, in other cases, the wife becomes a swan and the husband  remains a stork. If one of them says that he or she wants to maintain purity, he  or she is beaten. In some homes,

everyone becomes a swan. Then, whilst moving  along, they change from swans back into storks. The Father says: All of you have  to make yourselves into bestowers of happiness. Make even your children into  bestowers of happiness. This is a land of sorrow. Many calamities are still to  come. At that time, you will see how many people cry out in distress because the  Father came and yet they didnt claim the inheritance from Him. It will then be  too late! The Father comes to give them the kingdom

of heaven, but they then  lose it. Therefore, Baba says: Always bring in front of Baba those who are  strong and firm, those who are able to understand for themselves and are then  able to explain to others. Baba is not someone whom people can simply come and  have a glimpse of. Shiv Baba cannot be seen anywhere. Have you seen yourself, a  soul? You simply know it. Similarly, you have to know the Supreme Soul. Unless  you have a divine vision, you cannot see a soul. When you have a divine vision

now, you see the golden age. Then you will go there in a practical way. This  iron age will be destroyed when you children reach your karmateet stage. Achcha. To you sweetest,  beloved, long-lost and now-found children, love, remembrance and good morning  from the Mother, the Father, BapDada. The spiritual Father says namaste to you  spiritual children. Essence for dharna: 1. Whilst  seeing this old world, your intellects should be in yoga with the Father and the  new world. Pay attention that

you dont carry out any sinful act with your sense  organs. Always carry out pure acts. If you have any illness inside you, take  advice from the Surgeon. 2. The influence of  bad company is very negative. Caution yourself against this. Make yourself and  your family into bestowers of happiness. Never make excuses for not studying. Blessing:  May you be a  world benefactor and give everyone rays of peace and power with your elevated  feelings. Just as there are  constant benevolent feelings and

wishes in the Fathers thoughts and words, in  the same way, let the thoughts of you children be filled with benevolent  feelings and wishes for the world. While you are doing this work, let all the  souls of the world emerge. Be a master sun of knowledge, and, on the basis of  your pure feelings and elevated wishes, continue to give them rays of peace and  power and you will then be said to be a world benefactor. However, for this, you  must be liberated and free from all bondages. Slogan:  The

consciousness of I and mine are doors to body consciousness. Now close those  doors. Avyakt Signal: Adopt  the culture of truth and good manners Truth is recognised  by divinity being experienced in your thoughts, words, actions, relationships  and connections. When someone says, I always speak the truth, but does not  have divinity in his words or actions, others will not feel that truth to be the  truth. Therefore, imbibe divinity with the power of truth. No matter what you  have to
tolerate, do not be afraid. Truth is automatically proved according to  the time.

Brahma Kumaris Brahma Kumaris 18 .01.25        Morning Murli        Om Shanti   BapDada       Madhuban BapDadas sweet  invaluable elevated versions to be read in class on the Day of Remembrance of  our Pita Shri. Om shanti. The  spiritual Father is having a heart-to-heart conversation with you children and  giving you teachings. It is the Teachers duty to give you teachings and the  Gurus duty to show you your destination. The destination is liberation and  liberation in life. For liberation,

the pilgrimage of remembrance is essential  and for liberation in life, it is necessary to know the beginning, middle and  end of creation. The cycle of 84 is now coming to an end and we now have to  return home. By talking to yourself in this way, you will be very happy and you  will also give happiness to others. You have to have mercy to show them the path  to make them satopradhan from tamopradhan. Baba has explained the deep secrets  of charity and sin to you children: what charity is and

what sin is. The  greatest charity is to remember the Father and to remind others also. To open a  centre, to use your body, mind and wealth in serving others is charity. To be  influenced by the company of others and then to have waste thoughts, to waste  your time in thinking about others is a sin. If, while doing charity, someone  commits sin, then whatever income was earned would be finished. Whatever charity  had been performed would all be finished, and then, instead of being credited,  it

would be debited. For knowledgeable souls, the punishment for sinful actions  is a hundredfold, because they become those who defame the Satguru. This is why  the Father gives you these teachings: Sweet children, never perform sinful  actions. Protect yourself from being hurt by the vices. The Father has love  for you children and so He feels mercy. The father tells you his experience:  When I sit in solitude, I first remember the especially beloved children,  although they may be abroad or

anywhere else. When a good, serviceable child  leaves his body, Baba remembers that ones soul and gives him a searchlight. You  children know that there are two lights here, and both lights are together. Both  are very powerful lights. The early morning hours are good: after bathing, go  into solitude. Let there be a lot of happiness internally. The unlimited Father  sits here and explains to you children: Sweet children, consider yourselves to  be souls and remember Me, your Father and your

home. Children, never forget this  pilgrimage of remembrance. You will only become pure by having remembrance, and  you cannot go back home without becoming pure. The main thing is this knowledge  and yoga. The Father has this very big treasure that He gives to you children.  Yoga is a very big subject in this. When you children have good remembrance,  that remembrance then begets the Fathers remembrance. Children pull the Father  through their remembrance. There are some who come later and yet

claim a high  status, the basis of that is remembrance. They pull Him. It is said: Baba, have  mercy! Have compassion! But in this too, the main thing needed is remembrance.  Only by having remembrance will you continue to receive a current, and you souls  become healthy and full through this. Sometimes, when the father has to give a  current to a child, he loses his sleep over it. He has this deep concern that he  has to give a current to so-and-so. You know that your life increases when you

receive a current and you become everhealthy. It isnt that you have to sit in  one place and have remembrance. The Father explains: Remember the Father while  walking and moving around, while eating your meals or while doing anything. In  order to give a current to others, stay awake at night. It is explained to you  children: The more you remember the Father when you wake up early in the  morning, the greater the pull there will be. The Father will also give you a  searchlight. To remember a

soul means to give him a searchlight. You can call  that mercy or blessings. You children know  that this is an eternally predestined drama. This is a game of victory and  defeat. Whatever happens is fine. The Creator would definitely like the drama,  would He not? So, the children of the Creator would also like it. In this drama,  the Father only comes once to you children, with love in his heart, with heart  and soul, to serve you children. The Father loves all the children. You know  that in

the golden age, everyone loves each other a lot. There is love amongst  the animals too. There isnt a single animal who doesnt live with love. So, you  children have to become master oceans of love here. If you become that here,  that sanskar will become imperishable. The Father says: I have come to make you  lovely, exactly as I did a cycle ago. Whenever the Father hears the sound of a  childs anger, He gives this teaching: Child, it is not good to get angry,  because you will have sorrow

and you will cause sorrow for others. The Father is  the One who gives you permanent happiness and so you children have to become  like the Father. Never cause sorrow for one another. You have to become very,  very lovely. When you remember the lovely Father with a lot of love, you will  benefit yourselves and also others. The Lord of the  World has come to you as your Guest. Only with the help of you children is the  world going to be benefitted. Just as you spiritual children find the Father

very lovely, similarly, the Father finds you spiritual children very lovely,  because only you are the ones who will benefit the whole world by following  shrimat. You are now sitting here in this Godly family. The Father is sitting  personally in front of you. I eat with You, I sit with You You know that Shiv  Baba enters this one and says: Sweet children, forget your bodies and all your  bodily relations and constantly remember Me alone. This is the final birth, this  is an old world and

this old body is to be finished. There is the saying: When  you die, the world is dead for you. For making effort, there is just this  little time of the confluence age. Some children ask: Baba, till when will this  study continue? He will continue to speak this knowledge to you until the  divine kingdom is established. You will then be transferred to a new world. Baba  is serving you children while being so egoless. So, you children also have to do  just as much service. You have to follow

shrimat. When you follow your own  dictates, your fortune is crossed out. You Brahmins are Godly children. The  children of Brahma are brothers and sisters, Godly grandsons and granddaughters.  You are claiming your inheritance from Him. To the extent that you make effort,  so you will accordingly claim a status. In this, you need to have a lot of  practice of being detached. The Fathers first order is: May you be bodiless.  May you be soul conscious. Consider yourselves to be souls and

remember Me, the  Father, for only then will the alloy in you be removed and you will become real  gold. You children can say with a right: Baba, O sweet Baba! You made me belong  to You and gave me everything as my inheritance. No one can snatch away this  inheritance. You children have to have this much intoxication. You are the  lighthouses who show everyone the path to liberation and liberation in life.  While walking, sitting and moving around, just be a lighthouse. The Father says:

Children, there is now very little time. It is remembered: one moment, half a  moment As much as possible, engage yourselves in remembering the one Father and  then continue to increase your chart. Achcha. To you sweetest,  long-lost and now-found lucky and lovely stars of knowledge, love and  remembrance from the Mother, the Father, BapDadas heart and soul, with deep,  deep love, love, remembrance and good morning. The spiritual Father says namaste  to you spiritual children. Avyakt Elevated

versions: Constantly be a yogi. Just as you put a  switch on or off in a second, similarly, take the support of your body in a  second, and then, in a second, go beyond your body and become stable in the  bodiless stage. Come into your body one moment and then become bodiless in the  next. You have to practise this; it is called the karmateet stage - just as it  is in your hands whether to wear certain clothes or not to wear them. When there  is a need, you wear them and when there isnt, you

take them off. Let there be  the same experience in adopting the costume of your body and taking it off.  While performing actions, have the experience of wearing a costume and carrying  out your task. Then, as soon as you finish the task, become detached from the  costume. Experience the detachment of the body and soul while walking and moving  around, just as you would develop any other practice. However, who is able to  practise this? Those who are completely detached from their bodies,

everything  connected with their bodies, the physical world and relations and everything  else, and who have no attachment: only they can remain separate. If there isnt  any lightness in your subtle thoughts, if you are unable to be detached, you  will not be able to experience being separate. So, now, each one of you has to  practice this, to experience complete separation. By your staying in this stage,  other souls will also experience being detached; they will also experience this  stage

from you souls. When sitting in yoga, some souls experience the one who is  conducting the drill to be in a stage of detachment. In the same way, while  walking and moving around, there will be visions of your angelic stage. While  sitting here, many other souls who are going to be close in your golden-aged  family will have visions of your angelic form and your future royal form. In the  beginning, people used to have visions of both the perfect form of Brahma and of  Shri Krishna. Similarly,

people will have a vision of your double form. As you  continue to come into this stage of detachment, numberwise, others will also  have a vision of your double form. Now, let there be this complete practice, and  news will then begin to come from here and there. In the beginning, while  sitting at home, many souls who were to come close had visions. In the same way,  they will have visions now, too. While sitting here, your subtle forms will do  service in an unlimited way. This service now

remains to be done. You saw all  the examples in the corporeal form. Everything is going to happen, numberwise,  according to the drama. The more you stay in your subtle, angelic forms, the  more service your angelic forms will do. How long does it take for a soul to go  around the cycle and circle the whole world? So, now, your subtle forms will do  service, but only those who have this stage of detachment, only those who are  stable in their angelic forms. All the visions were seen in the

beginning. There  were separate visions of the perfect stage in the angelic form and of the  effort-making stage. Just as they had visions of the corporeal Brahma and the  perfect Brahma, separately, in the same way, there will be visions of you  especially beloved children. When the upheaval takes place, you wont be able to  do anything physically, and the impact of this would be felt through this  service. In the beginning too, there was the impact of visions, was there not?  Visions and

subtle experiences created an impact. In the end too, this service  has to take place. Does each of you have a vision of your perfect form? They  have now begun calling out to the Shaktis. Now, they dont call out to God so  much, but the calling out to the Shaktis has begun in full force. So, you have  to practise this every now and then. When you develop this habit, you will feel  a lot of bliss. You souls will become detached from your bodies in a second, you  will have that practice. Now,

this is the effort that has to be made. At present, there is  a need for you souls to be filled with all powers with your churning power; only  then will you have the stage of being totally absorbed in love and obstacles  will be removed. Waves of obstacles come when there is less force of  spirituality. So, at present, before doing the service for Shiv Ratri, you need  to have the force for filling yourselves with power. You may be having  programmes for yoga, but there is now a need to have

classes on experiencing and  giving others the experience of the powers through yoga. On the basis of your  own power, you now have to give power to others in a practical way. Do not think  about plans for just external service, but you need to be looking in all  directions. Those who are the instruments have to think about which aspect their  garden is weak in. In whatever way possible, you have to look at the weaknesses  of your garden with a strict eye. Make time to finish any weaknesses. You

saw the sakar  form:  whenever there was any particular wave, special service would then be done and  special plans made to give sakaash day and night. Special attention would be  paid to make weak souls full of power through which many souls used to have an  experience. Time was made at night to do the service of filling souls with  sakaash. So, service now has to be done especially to give sakaash. Be a  lighthouse and a might house and especially do this service. Only then will the  impact of

light and might spread everywhere. There is now a need for this. Just  as a wealthy person helps his close relatives in order to uplift them, in the  same way, you now have to give special sakaash to all the weak souls who are in  connection and relationship with you. Achcha. Blessing: May you be  truly loving and constantly experience the company of Father Brahma, the one  with a thousand arms. At present, the part  of Father Brahma with a thousand arms is being enacted. Just as your arms are

not able to do anything without you souls, in the same way, you arms, that is,  you children, cannot do anything without BapDada. In every task, there is first  the Fathers help. While the part of establishment is being enacted, BapDada is  with you children in every thought and at every second. Therefore, do not put up  a curtain of separation and be separated in yoga. Move along in the waves of the  Ocean of Love, sing His praise, and do not get hurt. The practical form of love  for the

Father is to have love for doing service. Slogan: The  experience and practice of the bodiless stage is the basis of claiming a number  ahead. With your powerful  mind, do the service of giving sakaash. Let yourself and others experience your  mind to be automatically full of the pure vibrations of good wishes and pure  feelings at every moment and for every soul. Let blessings continue to emerge  from your mind for all souls at every moment. Let your mind be constantly busy  in doing this

service. Just as you have become experienced in doing service with  words, and if you dont get any service to do, you experience yourselves to be  empty, in the same way, together with doing service with words, let service with  your mind also continue to take place automatically.

Brahma Kumaris Brahma Kumaris 18/02/25    Morning Murli                Om Shanti                BapDada    Madhuban Essence:  Sweet  children, it is your duty to give the Father's message to every home. Under all  circumstances, you must definitely find a way to give everyone the Father's  introduction. Question:  In which  aspect should you children be interested? Answer:  You should be  interested in noting down all the new points that emerge because it is difficult  to remember all of these

points. You can use your notes to explain to others.  However, you shouldn't write down the points and then leave your notebook aside.  The children who understand everything clearly are very interested in taking  notes. Song:  Thousands of  people of the world put a lock on your heart! Om shanti.  You sweetest,  spiritual children heard the song. Only the one Father would say the words,  "spiritual children". No one, but the spiritual Father, would ever call you His  spiritual children. You

children knows that there is the one Father of all the  spirits and that we are all brothers. People speak of brotherhood, but Maya  enters them in such a way that they call the Father omnipresent, which makes it  a fatherhood. Ravans kingdom exists over the old world. In the new world, there  is Ramas kingdom which is also called Gods kingdom. These matters have to be  understood. There are definitely two kingdoms: Gods kingdom and the devils  kingdom. There is the new world and there is

the old world. It must surely be  the Father who creates the new world. People of this world understand nothing  about the new world or the old world; they dont know anything.
